doc:
"Robert Walker (actor born 1940)" 0 Robert Hudson Walker Jr. (born April 15, 1940) is an American actor who was a familiar presence on TV in the 1960s and early 1970s. He became less active in later decades. He is best remembered today for playing the title role in the Star Trek episode "Charlie X". Robert_Hudson_Walker_Jr. ( born April_15_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor who was a_familiar_presence on TV in the_1960s and early_1970s . He became less_active in later_decades . He is_best_remembered today for playing the_title_role in the_Star_Trek_episode " Charlie_X_" .
